== O³ (ozone) ==
Relevance to
** <nowiki>[[Lubuntu | Lubuntu]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[Lubuntu-Artwork | Artwork]]</nowiki>

=== Concept ===
The idea for this release was the refound of blueness. A new and fresh air to Lubuntu from the highness of the atmosphere and one of its components, the Ozone, which is in danger thanks to us and our dirty way of life.

=== Theme ===
Ozone is based on <nowiki>[[http://shimmerproject.org/projects/bluebird/|Bluebird]]</nowiki>, by Simon Steinbeiß and Pasi Lallinaho, also derivated from <nowiki>[[http://lassekongo83.deviantart.com/gallery/1022855#/d2waxtr|Zuki Blues]]</nowiki> by Lassekongo (under GPL license), without Equinox engine dependencies (thank you very much, Simon, for your tips). Also, removed Nautilus specific definitions. Download the <nowiki>[[attachment:ozone_theme.tar.gz|theme]]</nowiki>.
